html:
If you have been wanting to build your physical movie collection or just want to watch some new movies for cheap, you should stop what you’re doing and check out Amazon’s fantastic 4K UHD Blu-ray sale featuring old and new movies.

Suggested Reading

Live Forever in the Universe of 'New World: Aeternum'

Suggested Reading

Amazon’s 3 for $33 Blu-ray UHD sale is back. The promotion went live on January 7 and is set to end on January 20, so don’t wait too long to snag some 4K movies.

This limited time Blu-ray promotion even includes some relatively new movies, like Joker 2, Trap, and Twisters, which by themselves typically cost nearly $30 or more. And remember you’ll need a UHD player to watch these movies. (Your PS5 and Xbox Series X are solid UHD players, assuming they have disc slots!)

Here are some of the newest movies included in the pick 3 for $33 deal:

  • Joker: Folie A Deux
  • The Green Knight
  • Oppenheimer
  • Twisters
  • Dune: Part Two (and Part One)
  • The Batman
  • The Fall Guy
  • Trap
  • Despicable Me 4
  • Megan
  • Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
  • Aquaman and The Lost Kingdom
  • The Super Mario Bros. Movie
  • The Flash
  • Barbie
  • Evil Dead Rise
  • Monkey Man

As before, how the deal works is you just pick three movies that are part of the deal, toss them in your cart, and then you pay $33 regardless of how much each movie costs. And like before, you can toss more than three movies into your cart to save even more. I built a test cart filled with $200 worth of movies and at checkout, Amazon only wanted $107.

Keep in mind that since this deal has gone live at least one movie, Furiosa, has left the promotion. Other movies, meanwhile, now have long delivery times as presumably a lot of people are buying copies right now, so don’t wait too long.

Here are some classics and older movies that are also included in the deal.

  • The Lego Batman Movie
  • Halloween (2018)
  • Space Jam
  • The Dark Knight
  • Superman: The Movie (1978)
  • Howard The Duck
  • Batman (1989)
  • Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
  • The Exorcist
  • Purple Rain
  • Jurassic Park
  • Goodfellas
  • The Matrix
  • The Maltese Falcon
  • Beetlejuice
